description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在文化大革命后期形成的一个政治集团，其核心成员为王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元。
description.en: A political faction in the Communist Party of China that emerged during the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, with its core members being Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮成员之一，曾任中国共产党中央委员会副主席，一度被视为毛泽东的接班人。
description.en: A member of the Gang of Four, he once served as Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and was at one point considered a successor to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮成员之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: A member of the Gang of Four, he served as a Standing Committee member of the CPC Politburo, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮的核心人物，毛泽东之妻。
description.en: The core figure of the Gang of Four and wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮成员之一，曾任中共中央政治局委员，主管全国的舆论宣传。
description.en: A member of the Gang of Four, he served as a member of the CPC Politburo and was in charge of national propaganda and public opinion.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席，是文化大革命的发动者。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the initiator of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 根据中共官方决议，这是一场由领导者错误发动，被反革命集团利用，给党、国家和各族人民带来严重灾难的内乱。
description.en: According to official CPC resolutions, it was a period of internal turmoil, mistakenly initiated by the leadership and exploited by counter-revolutionary groups, which brought severe disaster to the Party, the state, and people of all ethnic groups.

description.zh-cn: 由华国锋、叶剑英等人领导，逮捕四人帮及其核心成员的政治事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: A political event led by Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and others to arrest the Gang of Four and their core members, marking the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央第一副主席、国务院总理，毛泽东指定的接班人，领导了粉碎四人帮的行动。
description.en: Former First Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council, designated successor of Mao Zedong, and leader of the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央军委副主席，参与领导了粉碎四人帮的行动。
description.en: Former Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission, participated in leading the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央办公厅主任，在粉碎四人帮行动中提供了关键支持。
description.en: Former Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, provided key support in the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东之侄，被认为是四人帮集团的成员之一，在粉碎四人帮事件中被捕并被判刑。
description.en: Nephew of Mao Zedong, considered a member of the Gang of Four clique, arrested and sentenced in the aftermath of the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，文革期间曾两次被打倒。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, who was purged twice during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命初期被打倒。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, who was overthrown in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期的实际最高权力机构。
description.en: The de facto highest authority during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾被定为毛泽东的接班人，后在九一三事件中丧生，其集团与四人帮一同被审判。
description.en: Once designated as Mao Zedong's successor, he died in the September 13 Incident. His clique was tried alongside the Gang of Four.

nodes.id: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

zh-cn: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》
en: On the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'

description.zh-cn: 由姚文元编写的文章，被认为是发动文化大革命的导火线。
description.en: An article written by Yao Wenyuan, considered the catalyst for the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中央文革小组组长，后在中共九届二中全会上失势，并与四人帮一同受审。
description.en: Former head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, who fell from power at the Second Plenary Session of the 9th CPC Central Committee and was tried alongside the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 指中共中央副主席林彪及其家人在试图乘机叛逃苏联途中坠毁于蒙古的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and his family died in a plane crash in Mongolia while attempting to defect to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东批准，江青等人主导的政治运动，名义上批判林彪和孔子，实际上将矛头指向周恩来等中共元老。
description.en: A political campaign approved by Mao Zedong and led by Jiang Qing and others. Nominally criticizing Lin Biao and Confucius, it was actually aimed at Zhou Enlai and other veteran CPC leaders.

en: Criticize Deng and Counter-attack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Trend

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东发动的政治运动，旨在批判和再次打倒邓小平。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Mao Zedong aimed at criticizing and purging Deng Xiaoping again.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席毛泽东于1976年9月9日逝世。
description.en: Mao Zedong, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, passed away on September 9, 1976.

description.zh-cn: 群众为悼念周恩来而发起的运动，其中表达了对四人帮和文革的不满。
description.en: A movement initiated by the masses to mourn Zhou Enlai, during which dissatisfaction with the Gang of Four and the Cultural Revolution was expressed.

nodes.id: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
en: Trial of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭对林彪、江青两个反革命集团案主犯的公开审判。
description.en: The public trial of the principal defendants of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques by the Special Tribunal of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 此次会议决定开除王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元四人的党籍并撤销其党内外一切职务。
description.en: This plenary session decided to expel Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan from the party and remove them from all their posts inside and outside the party.

description.zh-cn: 王洪文是“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Wang Hongwen was a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥是“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao was a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 江青是“四人帮”的核心人物。
description.en: Jiang Qing was the core figure of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 姚文元是“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Yao Wenyuan was a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新被认为是四人帮集团的成员之一，并在粉碎四人帮事件中与四人帮一同被捕。
description.en: Mao Yuanxin was considered a member of the Gang of Four clique and was arrested along with them during the 'Smash the Gang of Four' event.

description.zh-cn: 江青是毛泽东的妻子。
description.en: Jiang Qing was the wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新是毛泽东的侄子。
description.en: Mao Yuanxin was Mao Zedong's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮是在文化大革命时期形成的一个政治集团。
description.en: The Gang of Four was a political faction that formed during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东提拔了王洪文、张春桥、姚文元到中央，并利用四人帮作为贯彻其文革思想的主要推手。
description.en: Mao Zedong promoted Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, and Yao Wenyuan to the central government and used the Gang of Four as the primary instrument for implementing his ideas during the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.target: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 姚文元编写了《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: Yao Wenyuan wrote 'On the New Historical Drama "Hai Rui Dismissed from Office"'.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东支持下，江青与张春桥指使姚文元编写《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's support, Jiang Qing and Zhang Chunqiao instructed Yao Wenyuan to write 'On the New Historical Drama "Hai Rui Dismissed from Office"'.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东支持下，张春桥与江青指使姚文元编写《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's support, Zhang Chunqiao and Jiang Qing instructed Yao Wenyuan to write 'On the New Historical Drama "Hai Rui Dismissed from Office"'.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》的发表成为发动文化大革命的导火线。
description.en: The publication of 'On the New Historical Drama "Hai Rui Dismissed from Office"' became the catalyst for launching the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 江青、张春桥、姚文元所在的中央文革小组在打倒刘少奇的过程中起到了至关重要的作用。
description.en: The Central Cultural Revolution Group, which included Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, and Yao Wenyuan, played a crucial role in the downfall of Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 江青、张春桥、姚文元所在的中央文革小组在打倒邓小平的过程中起到了至关重要的作用。
description.en: The Central Cultural Revolution Group, which included Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, and Yao Wenyuan, played a crucial role in the downfall of Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪九一三事件后，王洪文从上海上调中央，并与张、江、姚结成联盟。
description.en: After the Lin Biao September 13 Incident, Wang Hongwen was transferred from Shanghai to the central government and formed an alliance with Zhang, Jiang, and Yao.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮发动的“批林批孔运动”将矛头指向国务院总理周恩来。
description.en: The 'Criticize Lin, Criticize Confucius' campaign launched by the Gang of Four was aimed at Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 江青等人发动了“批林批孔运动”。
description.en: Jiang Qing and others launched the 'Criticize Lin, Criticize Confucius' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来逝世后，毛泽东以“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”为名再次打倒邓小平。
description.en: After Zhou Enlai's death, Mao Zedong launched the 'Criticize Deng and Counter-attack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Trend' campaign to purge Deng Xiaoping again.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在逝世前任命华国锋为中共中央第一副主席兼国务院总理，使其成为接班人。
description.en: Before his death, Mao Zedong appointed Hua Guofeng as the First Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council, making him his successor.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世一个月后，华国锋、叶剑英等人发动了粉碎四人帮的行动。
description.en: One month after Mao Zedong's death, Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and others launched the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋、叶剑英等人通过怀仁堂事变拘留了四人帮及其核心成员，结束了其政治生命。
description.en: Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and others detained the Gang of Four and their core members through the Huairentang Incident, ending their political careers.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋是粉碎四人帮行动的主要领导者之一。
description.en: Hua Guofeng was one of the main leaders of the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英是粉碎四人帮行动的主要领导者之一。
description.en: Ye Jianying was one of the main leaders of the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央办公厅主任的汪东兴在粉碎四人帮行动中提供了中央警卫部队的支持。
description.en: Wang Dongxing, then Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, provided the support of the Central Guard Unit in the operation to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 在悼念周恩来的四五运动中，群众表达了对四人帮和文革的不满。
description.en: During the Tiananmen Incident of 1976 to mourn Zhou Enlai, the masses expressed their dissatisfaction with the Gang of Four and the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中共十届三中全会决定开除王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元四人的党籍并撤销其党内外一切职务。
description.en: The Third Plenary Session of the 10th CPC Central Committee decided to expel Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan from the party and remove them from all their posts inside and outside the party.

relationships.target: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平的倡导下，中国政府开始对四人帮和林彪两个集团进行法律审判。
description.en: Under Deng Xiaoping's initiative, the Chinese government began the legal trial of the Gang of Four and Lin Biao cliques.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 江青在审判中被判处死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: Jiang Qing was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve during the trial.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 张春桥在审判中被判处死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve during the trial.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 王洪文在审判中被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: Wang Hongwen was sentenced to life imprisonment during the trial.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 姚文元在审判中被判处有期徒刑二十年。
description.en: Yao Wenyuan was sentenced to twenty years in prison during the trial.
